description: {"blocks":[{"key":"far3b","text":"The Thermo Scientific B-PER Bacterial Protein Extraction Reagent enables mild extraction of proteins from bacteria (E. coli) without the need for mechanical disruption. The reagent may be used for soluble protein extraction and inclusion body purification from bacterial cell lysates. The B-PER Reagent with Enzymes is supplied with lysozyme and DNase I to improve the extraction efficiency of large (\u003e 70 kDa) molecular weight proteins and proteins expressed in inclusion bodies.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":116,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"1gvr0","text":"Important Product Information","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fpc5d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"emfin","text":"The B-PER Reagent extracts proteins from recently prepared cells and frozen cells. Extraction is typically more effective with frozen cells. The amount of reagent required depends on the amount of cell paste.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1mv0i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"crqmf","text":"Important Product Information • The B-PER Reagent extracts proteins from recently prepared cells and frozen cells. Extraction is typically more effective with frozen cells. The amount of reagent required depends on the amount of cell paste.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fqrf2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8tb56","text":"B-PER Reagent effectively extracts soluble proteins from several common bacterial host strains and is especially suitable for the protease-defective expression host BL21 strains. If lysis is inefficient for a particular bacterial strain, freeze cells before extraction. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7udqa","text":"Add   of B-PER Reagent per gram of wet cell pellet. Pipette the suspension up and down until it is homogeneous.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"cfre8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"4","guid":"F142BA20F90B11EA80FE6BA879E8C2B7","id":0,"label":"","unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4or09","text":"Decant your spent LB and determine the mass of your cell pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"clith","text":"Freeze your pellet in the -20°C freezer overnight or quickly freeze your pellet in liquid nitrogen. When you are ready to proceed, thaw your cells at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
